body_html: There's even a simpler way to implement this, using the logic that extracts the subgraph necessary to compute torch.autograd.grad. I think I'm ok with adding it, no strong preferences really. But I don't think we should have any context managers for this.

body: There's even a simpler way to implement this, using the logic that extracts the subgraph necessary to compute `torch.autograd.grad`. I think I'm ok with adding it, no strong preferences really. But I don't think we should have any context managers for this.
